verses.verse: And <S%H310>afterward<s%> <S%H4971>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H3843>came<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H6213>Pharaoh<s%>, Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, Let my <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7971>go<s%>, that they may hold a <S%H2287>feast<s%> unto me in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%>.

And <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, Who is <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, that I should <S%H8085>hearken<s%> unto his <S%H6963>voice<s%> to let <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H7971>go<s%>? I <S%H3045>know<s%> not <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, and moreover I will not let <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H7971>go<s%>.

And they <S%H559>said<s%>, The <S%H430>God<s%> of the <S%H5680>Hebrews<s%> hath <S%H7122>met<s%> with <S%H3212>us<s%>: let us go, we pray <S%H7969>thee<s%>, three <S%H3117>days<s%>' <S%H1870>journey<s%> into the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%>, and <S%H2076>sacrifice<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%>, lest he <S%H6293>fall<s%> upon us with <S%H1698>pestilence<s%>, or with the <S%H2719>sword<s%>.

And the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H4872>them<s%>, Wherefore do ye, Moses and <S%H175>Aaron<s%>, <S%H6544>loose<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> from their <S%H4639>works<s%>? <S%H3212>get<s%> you unto your <S%H5450>burdens<s%>.
And <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H5971>Behold<s%>, the people of the <S%H776>land<s%> are now <S%H7227>many<s%>, and ye make them <S%H7673>rest<s%> from their <S%H5450>burdens<s%>.
And the same <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> the <S%H5065>taskmasters<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%>, and their <S%H7860>officers<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

Ye shall no <S%H3254>more<s%> <S%H5414>give<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H8401>straw<s%> to <S%H3835>make<s%> <S%H3843>brick<s%>, as <S%H8032>heretofore<s%>: let them <S%H3212>go<s%> and <S%H7197>gather<s%> straw for <S%H8401>themselves<s%>.

And the <S%H4971>number<s%> of the <S%H3843>bricks<s%>, which they did <S%H6213>make<s%> <S%H8032>heretofore<s%>, ye shall <S%H7760>lay<s%> upon <S%H1639>them<s%>; ye shall not diminish aught <S%H7503>thereof<s%>: for they are idle; therefore they <S%H6817>cry<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, Let us <S%H3212>go<s%> and <S%H2076>sacrifice<s%> to our <S%H430>God<s%>.
Let heavier <S%H5656>work<s%> be <S%H3513>laid<s%> upon the <S%H582>men<s%>, that they may <S%H6213>labor<s%> <S%H8159>therein<s%>; and let them not regard <S%H8267>lying<s%> <S%H1697>words<s%>.

And the <S%H5065>taskmasters<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%> went <S%H3318>out<s%>, and their <S%H7860>officers<s%>, and they <S%H559>spake<s%> to the <S%H5971>people<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%>, I will not <S%H5414>give<s%> you <S%H8401>straw<s%>.

Go <S%H3212><s%> <S%H3947>yourselves<s%>, get you <S%H8401>straw<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> ye can <S%H4672>find<s%> <S%H3588>it<s%>; for <S%H1697>nought<s%> of your <S%H5656>work<s%> shall be <S%H1639>diminished<s%>.
So the <S%H5971>people<s%> were scattered <S%H6327>abroad<s%> throughout all the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> to <S%H7197>gather<s%> <S%H7179>stubble<s%> for <S%H8401>straw<s%>.

And the <S%H5065>taskmasters<s%> were <S%H213>urgent<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, <S%H3615>Fulfil<s%> your <S%H4639>works<s%>, your <S%H3117>daily<s%> <S%H1697>tasks<s%>, as when there <S%H1961>was<s%> <S%H8401>straw<s%>.

And the <S%H7860>officers<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, whom <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%>'s <S%H5065>taskmasters<s%> had <S%H7760>set<s%> over <S%H5221>them<s%>, were beaten, and <S%H559>demanded<s%>, Wherefore have ye not <S%H3615>fulfilled<s%> your <S%H2706>task<s%> both <S%H8543>yesterday<s%> and <S%H3117>to-day<s%>, in making <S%H3835>brick<s%> as <S%H8032>heretofore<s%>?

Then the <S%H7860>officers<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> and <S%H6817>cried<s%> unto <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, Wherefore <S%H6213>dealest<s%> thou thus with thy <S%H5650>servants<s%>?

There is no <S%H8401>straw<s%> <S%H5414>given<s%> unto thy <S%H5650>servants<s%>, and they <S%H559>say<s%> to <S%H6213>us<s%>, Make <S%H3843>brick<s%>: <S%H5650>and<s%>, behold, thy servants are <S%H5221>beaten<s%>; but the <S%H2398>fault<s%> is in thine own <S%H5971>people<s%>.
But he <S%H559>said<s%>, Ye are <S%H7503>idle<s%>, ye are <S%H7503>idle<s%>: therefore ye <S%H559>say<s%>, Let us <S%H3212>go<s%> and <S%H2076>sacrifice<s%> to <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.

Go <S%H3212><s%> therefore <S%H5647>now<s%>, and work; for there shall no <S%H8401>straw<s%> be <S%H5414>given<s%> <S%H5414>you<s%>, yet shall ye deliver the <S%H8506>number<s%> of <S%H3843>bricks<s%>.

And the <S%H7860>officers<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> did <S%H7200>see<s%> that they were in <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H559>case<s%>, when it was said, Ye shall not <S%H1639>diminish<s%> aught from your <S%H3843>bricks<s%>, your <S%H3117>daily<s%> <S%H1697>tasks<s%>.
And they <S%H6293>met<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%>, who <S%H5324>stood<s%> in the <S%H7125>way<s%>, as they came <S%H3318>forth<s%> from <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%>:

and they <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H3068>them<s%>, Jehovah <S%H7200>look<s%> upon <S%H8199>you<s%>, and judge; because ye have made our <S%H7381>savor<s%> to be <S%H887>abhorred<s%> in the <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%>, and in the <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of his <S%H5650>servants<s%>, to <S%H5414>put<s%> a <S%H2719>sword<s%> in their <S%H3027>hand<s%> to slay <S%H2026>us<s%>.

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H7725>returned<s%> unto <S%H136>Jehovah<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H136>Lord<s%>, wherefore hast thou dealt <S%H7489>ill<s%> with this <S%H5971>people<s%>? why is it that thou hast sent <S%H7971>me<s%>?

For since I <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> to <S%H1696>speak<s%> in thy <S%H8034>name<s%>, he hath dealt <S%H7489>ill<s%> with this <S%H5971>people<s%>; neither hast thou <S%H5337>delivered<s%> thy <S%H5971>people<s%> at <S%H5337>all<s%>.
